thread.title: Clemson's National Championship-Winning Touchdown, As Heard On 8 Different Networks
thread.title_full: Clemson's National Championship-Winning Touchdown, As Heard On 8 Different Networks

author: Timothy Burke on Screengrabber, shared by Timothy Burke to Deadspin
title: Clemson's National Championship-Winning Touchdown, As Heard On 8 Different Networks
text:
Go to permalink 
Clemson capped off a national championship finish we’ll never forget with Hunter Renfrow’s touchdown catch with just one second remaining. Above is how it sounded on ESPN; below are how commentators on seven other networks—including Clemson radio—reacted to the play. 
ESPN Deportes
